feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 12 at 8:14PM AKST until January 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 50 below are occurring. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN....Through 6am Thursday.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 8:03PM AKST until January 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph. * WHERE...Along the Richardson Highway North of Black Rapids. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will cause reduced visbility. Snow drifts will form. Gusty winds could blow around

entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 12 at 6:08PM AKST until January 13 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 5:08PM AKST until January 14 at 2:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 2 AM AKST FRIDAY FROM PORTAGE TO THE HOPE CUTOFF... * WHAT...Heavy snow likely. entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued January 12 at 10:50AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AN AIR QUALITY ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED BY THE IDAHO DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY... Due to elevated pollutant levels, the air quality is forecast to become unhealthy for sensitive groups in Franklin County, including the city of Preston among other. This advisory will remain in effect until air quality has significantly improved.
